about.intro1: Final-year engineering student in Data Science & AI, specializing in Big Data and Data Engineering. Passionate about distributed architectures, backend, Linux administration, and DevOps for data pipelines.
about.intro2: My goal: to design and operate scalable and reliable data platforms, from ingestion to serving, with quality, security, and performance.
